name: red_rooster
text: it worries me how warm that vodka martini is going to get before santa arrives.

name: c_dizzle
text: That was the first thing I noticed. :c\

name: lawbot
text: I am worried about the evaporation. I am also worried that Santa, being oldschool will prefer a gin martini.

name: c_dizzle
text: definately gin.

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lolsworth, Sakana, serf, riotdejaneiro, flaxplus, fourganger, grayestnova, odei, barfighting, equinn2006, Ebessan, patiently56, Aaron_Haynes, fattypneumonia, Troy_Convers, Brosaurus, Wulvaine, clembot, mrblank91)

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I dunno, this seems pretty on-the-nose.

name: aaron_haynes
text: It is another artist/writer's interpretation of Philippe. Obviously other people are not going to speak with Onstad's voice exactly. It is interesting to see this once in a while.

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, apocowarg, Unfun, d3lvn, Ebessan, PurpleRose, fattypneumonia, Wulvaine)

name: sp1derbaby
text: But... what's the point of having guest strips if they're just like the regular strips?

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Lolsworth, riotdejaneiro, c_dizzle, d3lvn, PurpleRose, Madoushi)

name: snowman
text: Would you rather have nothing?  I think he runs guest strips during times when he is not available.

name: tekende
text: A comment left by tekende was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mikeronomicon, c_dizzle, clancine, Troy_Convers, echidnaboy)

name: farqussus
text: Hear Hear! The speaker recognises the thoughtful fellow with the spectacles and ideas similar to mine!

name: snowman
text: I...can't even fathom this.  I'm not the biggest fan of all the guest strips either, but...I mean, at least they're somewhat interesting at times?  It gives us something to post about?  Why would you rather have nothing?

name: c_dizzle
text: These people cannot embrace change...They feel threatened by it...They are the neo-cons of assetbar.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I would give you another chubby if I could sir. I say fie, fie to the nay sayers. While the guest comics aren't always as good as Onstad's, some of them are awesome in their own right. The people who whine about it have to much time on their hands, and are likely troglodytes living in their parent's basement. Some of them are likely to have never been laid.

name: farqussus
text: You make it sound like there's someone on Assbar who ISN'T living in their parents' basement and HAS been laid.

name: acefalco
text: Well, I personally moved out the day after I graduated from high school and have been married for 4 years which means I've now had sex 4 times.

name: farqussus
text: with the same person? only counts as once.

name: rheabird13
text: guaranteed , actually.

name: poodlelucy
text: after a mediocre guest strip, we can all further appreciate the genius that is Onstad.

name: lolsworth
text: What's the point of YOUR MOM

name: farqussus
text: the point of YOUR MOM is your wang

name: the_prophet
text: HIs main character's personality's is fairly similar, I think he subconsciously merged the two.

name: jeet
text: I think the 2nd panel is right on. 1st is sort of Phillipe-ish, but the 3rd... no. not really.

name: soticoto
text:
Just as well we're talking about Philippe and not Phillipe here then, isn't it?
Cos 3rd is totally Philippe, and 2nd not so much so.

name: canusdivinus
text: Everyone around Philippe thinks it is rad to be an alcoholic. It's gonna rub off on a kid.

name: saint
text: santa would have to do a whole lot more than deliver presents to good kids yearly if he did the whole q-tip routine. he'd have to hold some sort of rehab for the bad kids so they could get presents too.

name: centipede_damascus
text: John Allison is one of my Top Five Webcomics Dudes.

name: trollcollins
text:
Scary-go-round and Achewood are my two most favourite webcomics . . . when they come together, it is like a food combination that is unimaginably delicious in theory, but in actuality it is just sorta tasty.

Gotta give it a 5, anyway, 'cause, you know . . . John Allison playing with Chis Onstad's toys = hooray.

name: crinklebat
text:
Yeah I kind of feel the same way...like figs and goat cheese, they're really good together, but I just kind of expected my tongue never to need to taste again and instead I ate again the following day.

I am glad there is someone else who has the same exact favorite webcomics as me, anyway.

name: senseihollywood
text: whaddya know? ...apparently I'm Santa Claus

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I think Phillipe knows that Ray is Santa Claus, at least for his house, judging from his gifts.

name: dovey
text:
Phillipe reads like Nice Pete in this strip.

John Allison is still a dude though

name: dougthehead
text: Actually, Phillipe reads like half the characters in Scary Go Round.  I do like Allison's comics, though.  Maybe he should try Nice Pete sometime.

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by catgrl131, fattypneumonia, ovenface)

name: heccibiggs
text:
"Outsider"? Careful, you're sounding distinctly cultish.

CULT, I said CULT.

name: rowboat
text:
If you think that this is anything else, you're lying to yourself. Now drink this.

[IMGS OFF]

name: notcool
text: OH YEAAHH!

name: robot_roll_call
text: This was up for like a week when I started reading Achewood. I read the whole archives in two days and this  was the last one. I guess what I am trying to say is I have nostalgia for this one, even if it is a guest strip.

name: tekende
text: I'm pretty sure, no, absolutely certain, that Philippe would never say "I like to think..."

name: tekende
text: Or "I like to imagine..."

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I was personally put off by "...for me, Philippe."

Of course, since he was the only character, I was ready to assume that he was talking. But when that came up, I thought someone else was talking to him .

Guest strip, eh. But at least it looks cute.

name: narcolepticdog
text: That really put me off too. not the worst of the guest strips though.

name: alm96
text: I thought Santa was always the designated driver.
